channel.title: MESG Contributions Hub
channel.description:
Hey MESG community!

We’re finally pulling the wraps off of our long-awaited community Contribution Hub, built to exhibit and reward all of the contributions that make up MESG.

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://blog.mesg.com/introducing-mesg-contributions/
